com.px100systems.data.plugin.persistence.jdbc

Class Storage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.px100systems.data.plugin.persistence.jdbc.Storage

  • public class Storage
extends java.lang.Object
    Storage (relational table) configuration. Every storage can (theoretically) use a different JDBC connection/database.
    Storages should be organized by the most efficient data block size for the records/documents it stores. Related documents (saved in one transaction) can reside on different storages, however should belong to one data source (connection).
    The storage is used internally by JdbcPersistence provider to load and save records.
    See setters for configuration parameters.
    Author:
    Alex Rogachevsky
